summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5346 for the construction of a trunk sewer and subsewers along 43rd Avenue North, from a point 120 feet more or less north of East Lynn Street to East Garfield Street, and along certain parts of certain others treets and avenues, under Ordinance No. 62289, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
